abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the proposed project
            are: (i) to ensure that ATC effectively provides river
            transport services to meet present and medium-term demand
            from Northern Congo, Southern Cameroon and the Central
            African Republic; (ii) to establish a national transport
            planning mechanism; and (iii) to assist the Office Congolais
            du Bois in improving its timber marketing operations. The
            project would consist of three main components: (i) floating
            equipment and spare parts; (ii) civil and mechanical works
            for port facilities, waterways, and a training center; and
            (iii) technical assistance for project supervision,
            training, ATC management improvements, transport planning,
            and OCB operations.
